sql-statements.statement: DELETE FROM org_attribute WHERE value_int = :1 AND item_name = 'Fee Schedule'
DELETE FROM person_attribute WHERE value_int = :1 AND item_name = 'Fee Schedule'
App::Statements::Catalog

SELECT oc.internal_catalog_id FROM offering_catalog oc, org_attribute oa WHERE oa.parent_id = :1 AND oc.catalog_type = :2 AND oa.item_name = 'Fee Schedule' AND oa.value_int = oc.internal_catalog_id AND ROWNUM <2
select id from HCFA1500_Service_Place_Code
select id from HCFA1500_Service_Type_Code
select * from offering_catalog_entry where catalog_id = ? and entry_type in (?,?)
select * from offering_catalog where internal_catalog_id = ?
select * from offering_catalog where org_internal_id = :1 and catalog_type = :2
SELECT * FROM Offering_Catalog WHERE org_internal_id = :1 AND catalog_type = :2 AND catalog_subtype = :3
SELECT * FROM offering_catalog WHERE catalog_type = :1 AND org_internal_id =:2 AND catalog_id = :3
select caption from catalog_entry_type where id = ?
select * from offering_catalog_entry where entry_id = ?

select name, entry_type, ct.caption, code, modifier from offering_catalog_entry c, catalog_entry_type ct where c.entry_type = ct.id and entry_type between 100 and 199 and status = 1 order by name, entry_type
SELECT entry_id FROM OFFERING_CATALOG_ENTRY WHERE code BETWEEN (:1) AND (:2) AND catalog_id = :3 AND modifier IS NULL

select typ.caption, code, modifier, name, unit_cost, description, status, entry_id, entry_type from offering_catalog_entry c, catalog_entry_type typ where c.entry_type = ct.id and entry_type between 100 and 199 and status = 1 order by typ.caption, parent_entry_id, code, modifier, name, unit_cost

select oce.flags,oce.units_avail,oce.entry_type, oce.name, oce.description, oce.unit_cost, oce.data_text, oc.catalog_id as catalog_id,oce.code,oce.modifier,oc.caption, oc.internal_catalog_id from offering_catalog oc, offering_catalog_entry oce where oce.entry_id = ? and oc.internal_catalog_id = oce.catalog_id
SELECT * FROM offering_catlaog_entry WHERE catalog_id = :1
select * from offering_catalog_entry where code = upper(?) and entry_type = ?
select * from offering_catalog_entry where catalog_id = ? and entry_type = ?

select oce.catalog_id, oce.parent_entry_id, oce.entry_type, oce.code, oce.modifier, oce.default_units, oce.unit_cost, oce.taxable from offering_catalog oc, offering_catalog_entry oce where oc.org_internal_id = ? and oc.catalog_id = oce.catalog_id and oce.cost_type != 0 and oce.entry_type in (0,100) and oce.status = 1 and oce.code = upper(?)
select * from offering_catalog_entry where parent_entry_id = ?
select * from offering_catalog where parent_catalog_id = ?
SELECT oce.code,oce.catalog_id FROM offering_catalog_entry oce, offering_catalog oc WHERE upper(oce.code)= upper(:1) AND oc.internal_catalog_id = :2 AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id
SELECT * FROM offering_catalog_entry WHERE catalog_id = :1 AND modifier = :2

SELECT distinct oc.internal_catalog_id as internal_catalog_id, catalog_id FROM insurance_attribute ia, offering_catalog oc WHERE oc.internal_catalog_id= ia.value_text AND ia.item_name = 'Fee Schedule' AND ia.parent_id in (:1,:2)
SELECT id,caption FROM catalog_entry_type WHERE ID IN (0,100,210,220,230)

SELECT NVL(NVL(( NVL((SELECT description FROM Ref_HCPCS WHERE UPPER(hcpcs) = UPPER(:1)), (SELECT description FROM Ref_CPT WHERE UPPER(cpt) = UPPER(:1)) )), (SELECT oce.entry_id FROM offering_catalog oc , offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE UPPER(oce.code) = UPPER(:1) AND oc.org_internal_id = :2 AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.catalog_type = 2) ),NULL) as description FROM DUAL
select cpt, name, description from ref_cpt where cpt = upper(?)
select cpt, name, description from ref_cpt where cpt like upper(?)
select cpt, name, description from ref_cpt where (name like ? or description like ?)
select epsdt, name, description from ref_epsdt where epsdt = upper(?)
select epsdt, name, description from ref_epsdt where epsdt like upper(?)
select epsdt, name, description from ref_epsdt where (name like ? or description like ?)
select hcpcs, name, description from ref_hcpcs where hcpcs = upper(?)
select hcpcs, name, description from ref_hcpcs where hcpcs like upper(?)
select hcpcs, name, description from ref_hcpcs where (name like ? or description like ?)
select icd, descr from ref_icd where icd = upper(?)
select icd, descr from ref_icd where icd like upper(?)
select icd, descr from ref_icd where (descr like ?)
select caption from HCFA1500_Modifier_Code where abbrev = ?
select id from HCFA1500_Modifier_Code where abbrev = ?
select caption from HCFA1500_Service_Place_Code where abbrev = ?
select id from HCFA1500_Service_Place_Code where abbrev = ?
select abbrev from HCFA1500_Service_Place_Code where id = ?
select id from HCFA1500_Service_Place_Code where id = ?
select caption from HCFA1500_Service_Type_Code where abbrev = ?
select id from HCFA1500_Service_Type_Code where abbrev = ?
select abbrev from HCFA1500_Service_Type_Code where id = ?
select id from HCFA1500_Service_Type_Code where id = ?
select * from Offering_catalog where org_internal_id = ? and upper(catalog_id) = (?)
select * from Offering_catalog where org_internal_id = ? and upper(catalog_id) = (?) and catalog_type = ?
SELECT internal_catalog_id FROM offering_catalog WHERE catalog_id = ?

SELECT oce2.code, oce2.modifier FROM offering_catalog oc, offering_catalog_entry oce, offering_catalog_entry oce2 WHERE oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oc.catalog_type = 2 AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oce.entry_id = oce2.parent_entry_id AND oce.code = upper(?)

SELECT oce.entry_id as entry_id, oce.code , oce.modifier, oce.catalog_id, oce.parent_entry_id, oce2.name, oce2.code as proc_code, oce2.description FROM offering_catalog_entry oce , offering_catalog_entry oce2 WHERE oce.entry_id= :1 AND oce2.entry_id = oce.parent_entry_id
SELECT oce.entry_id FROM offering_catalog oc , offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE oce.code = :1 AND oc.org_internal_id = :2 AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.catalog_type = 2

SELECT entry_id,entry_type,code,modifier,name,description, 1 as code_level,parent_entry_id FROM offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE oce.entry_id= :1 UNION SELECT entry_id,entry_type,code,modifier,name,description, 2 as code_level,parent_entry_id FROM offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE rownum < 7 AND parent_entry_id IN (SELECT entry_id as code_level FROM offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE oce.entry_id= :1 )

SELECT oce.entry_id, oce.catalog_id, oce.code, oce.modifier, oce.name, oce.default_units, oce.unit_cost, oce.description, oce.taxable FROM offering_catalog oc , offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE oce.code = ? AND oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.catalog_type = 2
SELECT internal_catalog_id FROM Offering_Catalog WHERE caption = 'Misc Procedure Code' AND catalog_type = 2 AND org_internal_id = :1
SELECT code as proc_code, modifier, name, description,catalog_id FROM Offering_Catalog_Entry WHERE entry_id = :1
select caption from HCFA1500_Modifier_Code where id = ?

SELECT org_id FROM org o, org_attribute oa, offering_catalog oc WHERE o.org_internal_id = oa.parent_id AND oc.internal_catalog_id= oa.value_int AND oa.item_name = 'Fee Schedule' AND oc.internal_catalog_id = :1
select * from offering_catalog where org_internal_id = ? and parent_catalog_id is NULL
SELECT parent_id as person_id FROM person_attribute pa, offering_catalog oc WHERE oc.internal_catalog_id= pa.value_int AND pa.item_name = 'Fee Schedule' AND oc.internal_catalog_id = :1

select ocp.allowed_cost from Offering_Catalog_Entry oce, Offering_CatEntry_Price ocp, Contract_Catalog cc where cc.internal_contract_id = ocp.internal_contract_id and ocp.entry_id = oce.entry_id and cc.product_ins_id = ? and cc.org_internal_id = ? and oce.code = ?

SELECT oc.internal_catalog_id, oce.entry_type, oc.catalog_id, oce.data_text, h.caption, oce.unit_cost, oce.flags FROM Offering_Catalog_Entry oce, HCFA1500_Service_Type_Code h, Offering_Catalog oc WHERE oce.code = upper(:1) AND ( (modifier = :2) or (:2 is NULL AND modifier is NULL)) AND oce.catalog_id = :3 AND (oc.effective_begin_date <= to_date(:4,'MM/DD/YYYY') or oc.effective_begin_date is NULL) AND (oc.effective_end_date >= to_date(:4,'MM/DD/YYYY') or oc.effective_end_date is NULL) AND oce.data_text = h.abbrev (+) AND oc.internal_catalog_id = oce.catalog_id
select distinct(parent_id), read_count from REF_CPT_Usage where org_internal_id = ? and parent_id is not null and rownum < 16 order by read_count desc
select distinct(parent_id), read_count from REF_CPT_Usage where person_id = ? and parent_id is not null and rownum < 16 order by read_count desc
select distinct(parent_id), read_count from REF_ICD_Usage where org_internal_id = ? and parent_id is not null and rownum < 16 order by read_count desc
select distinct(parent_id), read_count from REF_ICD_Usage where person_id = ? and parent_id is not null and rownum < 16 order by read_count desc
select * from OfCatalog_Attribute where parent_id = ? and value_type = ? and item_name = ?

SELECT oc.internal_catalog_id, oce.entry_type, oc.catalog_id, oce.data_text, h.caption, oce.unit_cost, oce.flags FROM Offering_Catalog_Entry oce, HCFA1500_Service_Type_Code h, Offering_Catalog oc WHERE oce.code = upper(:1) AND ( (modifier = :2) or (:2 is NULL AND modifier is NULL)) AND oce.catalog_id = :3 AND oce.data_text = h.abbrev (+) AND oc.internal_catalog_id = oce.catalog_id
select * from Offering_Catalog_Entry where code = upper(?) and modifier is null and entry_type = ? and catalog_id = ?
select * from Offering_Catalog_Entry where code = upper(?) and modifier = ? and entry_type = ? and catalog_id = ?
select * from Offering_Catalog_Entry where code = upper(?) and modifier is NULL and catalog_id = ?
select * from Offering_Catalog_Entry where code = upper(?) and (modifier = ? or modifier is NULL) and catalog_id = ?

select oc.INTERNAL_CATALOG_ID ,entry_type,oc.catalog_id,data_text,h.caption from Offering_Catalog_Entry oce, HCFA1500_Service_Type_Code h, Offering_Catalog oc where oce.code = upper(?) and oce.modifier is NULL and oce.catalog_id = ? and oce.data_text (+) = h.abbrev and oc.internal_catalog_id = oce.catalog_id

select oc.INTERNAL_CATALOG_ID,entry_type,oc.catalog_id,data_text,h.caption from Offering_Catalog_Entry oce, HCFA1500_Service_Type_Code h, Offering_Catalog oc where oce.code = upper(?) and (modifier = ? or modifier is NULL) and oce.catalog_id = ? and oce.data_text (+) = h.abbrev and oc.internal_catalog_id = oce.catalog_id
select * from Offering_catalog where catalog_id = ? and org_internal_id = ?
SELECT * FROM Offering_Catalog WHERE internal_catalog_id = ? AND org_internal_id = ?
SELECT * FROM Offering_Catalog WHERE internal_catalog_id = :1 AND org_internal_id = :2 AND catalog_type = :3
